baseName.value: Sanitary ceramic products: bidets and WCs (in VC)

generalComment.value:
Specific data (primary data) for processes within the Ceramica Globo plant in Fabrica di Roma (VT). Also specific data are the distances calculated by the suppliers of the raw materials used (primary data). 




With regard to the production process understood as energy consumption, heat, waste produced, emissions released into the environment, etc., the specific quantity per average product was determined by dividing the total consumption by the total production of Ceramica Globo. In this case, therefore, reference was made to the entire production of sanitary ceramic products in the Fabrica di Roma (VT) plant for the year 2021. 


Included in the cut-off: the co-product sludge sold, as it contributes less than 1% of Ceramica Globo's total income in the year of analysis 2021, and the contribution related to atmospheric emissions reported with the minor symbol in the flue gas analysis and the contribution of heavy metals in wastewater.

technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse.value: VC product consisting of 25% clay, 30% kaolin and 45% ventilated, for the production of bidets and WCs

technologicalApplicability.value:
Average product made of Vitreous China, used for sanitary ceramics (bidets and WCs)

 "CPC CODE 37210 Ceramic sinks, baths, water closet pans, flushing
cisterns and similar sanitary fixtures"

shortDescription.value: PCR ICMQ 3.0 - rev. 3.0 - Products and services for construction

useAdviceForDataSet.value: Cradle to gate with options: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, C3, C4, D

publicationAndOwnership.licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
